text: Hi all, also on the topic of bleaching and clearing, would anyone know of a good protocol where we bleach the sample, but still keep endogenous fluorescence? We're afraid that bleaching with H2O2 + EtOH will end up damaging our probe. Thanks a million!

elements.text: Hi all, also on the topic of bleaching and clearing, would anyone know of a good protocol where we bleach the sample, but still keep endogenous fluorescence? We're afraid that bleaching with H2O2 + EtOH will end up damaging our probe. Thanks a million!
